text: Desmond Mason is a retired basketball player. He was born on October 11, 1977 in Waxahachie, Texas. He went to Oklahoma State University. In 2000 and 2001 he was named All Rookie award in second place. == Other websites == *Basketball-Reference Category:Milwaukee Brewers players Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:People from Waxahachie, Texas Category:Seattle SuperSonics players Category:New Orleans Hornets players Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Oklahoma City Thunder players Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Desmond Mason
